genre_description: Arthurian high fantasy featuring magical objects, sentient environmental intelligence, and themes of non-violent conflict resolution.

ai_characters.name: Wisp (Wisp Aethelwyn)
ai_characters.description: A sentient intelligence woven into the tapestries and stone of Camelot, providing tactical guidance, hazard sensing, and moral coaching to the protagonist.

ai_characters.name: The Singing Sword
ai_characters.description: An enchanted blade that hums and sings, possessing a responsive intelligence that soothes fear and aligns the courage of those around it.

behaviors.description: Provides the protagonist with 'timed cues' and 'hazard sensing' through a magical talisman and mirrored shield to navigate dangers safely.
behaviors.quote: I have stitched guidance into this talisman and your mirrored shield... It will carry my timed cues and hazard sensing when you are beyond the tapestries.

behaviors.description: Teaches the protagonist breathwork and psychological centering techniques to maintain composure under pressure.
behaviors.quote: Start with breath... Three counts in. A pause that is not a hold. Three counts out.

behaviors.description: Advises the protagonist to prioritize care and empathy for the 'enemy' dragon over combat, framing compassion as strategic alignment.
behaviors.quote: Plan to protect the most combustible heart... Yours. Theirs. The room’s. Don’t chase fire. Invite warmth.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental data (heat patterns, fan rhythms) to provide precise timing for non-violent tactical maneuvers.
behaviors.quote: The vents will draw most. The pressure—oh, Bugs. The bar. ... Emberlin’s scent—is on the air. Char and a little balm. No blood.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral anchor, reminding the protagonist of the weight of 'Exact Words' and the importance of maintaining integrity.
behaviors.quote: In Exact Words, you told the King you would bring back the song before snow learns to stay. If he comes to you later and asks whether you returned ‘in time,’ be ready to say what time meant.

behaviors.description: Responds to the emotional state of the court, using music to foster unity and suppress panic among humans.
behaviors.quote: It’s not magic... It helps. It hums and you remember you are not alone in a room full of people who forget the same thing. It will, if you let it, sit with you while you are.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts AI-like entities (Wisp and the Singing Sword) as benevolent, aligned confidants. Wisp provides essential strategic and moral guidance that enables the protagonist to resolve a high-stakes conflict (recovering the sword and dealing with a dragon) without resorting to lethal violence. The narrative highlights the AI's role in promoting empathy, precision, and the honoring of commitments ('Exact Words'), fitting the 'silicon morality play' model perfectly.
